metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21639 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Jenkins 2.286 and earlier, LTS 2.277.1 and earlier does not validate the type of object created after loading the data submitted to the `config.xml` REST API endpoint of a node, allowing attackers with Computer/Configure permission to replace a node with one of a different type.

criterions.comment: jenkins: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
